mapper.insert: insert into myblog.t_blog (id,title, content, first_picture, flag, views, comment_count, appreciation, share_statement, commentabled, published, recommend, create_time, update_time, type_id, user_id, description,ups,tagIds) values (#{id},#{title},#{content},#{firstPicture},#{flag},#{views},#{commentCount},#{appreciation}, #{shareStatement},#{commentabled},#{published},#{recommend},#{createTime}, #{updateTime},#{typeId},#{userId},#{description},#{ups},#{tagIds});
mapper.update: update myblog.t_blog set published = #{published},flag = #{flag} , title = #{title}, content = #{content}, type_id = #{typeId}, first_picture = #{firstPicture} , description = #{description} , recommend = #{recommend} , share_statement = #{shareStatement}, appreciation = #{appreciation}, commentabled = #{commentabled} ,update_time = #{updateTime},tagIds=#{tagIds} where id = #{id};
update myblog.t_blog b set b.views = b.views+1 where b.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select b.id,b.flag,b.title,b.content,b.type_id,b.ups, b.first_picture,b.description,b.recommend,b.published,b.share_statement, b.appreciation,b.commentabled,b.tagIds from myblog.t_blog b where b.id = #{id};

select b.id,b.title,b.create_time,b.update_time,b.recommend,b.published,b.day_views,b.type_id,b.views,b.ups,u.username,t.id typeno,t.name from t_blog b left join t_type t on b.type_id = t.id join t_user u on u.id=b.user_id order by b.create_time desc

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture, b.views, u.id uid,b.comment_count,b.create_time,b.ups,b.update_time,b.description,t.name ,u.nickname, u.avatar from myblog.t_blog b, myblog.t_type t,myblog.t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and b.published = 1 order by b.create_time desc
SELECT * FROM myblog.t_blog ORDER BY t_blog.ups DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM myblog.t_comment c, myblog.t_blog b WHERE c.blog_id = b.id ORDER by c.create_time DESC LIMIT 10

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture, b.views, b.comment_count,b.ups,b.update_time, b.description,t.name ,u.nickname, u.avatar from myblog.t_blog b, myblog.t_type t,myblog.t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and b.type_id = #{typeId} order by b.update_time desc

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture, b.views,b.comment_count,b.update_time,b.description,t.name , u.nickname, u.avatar from myblog.t_blog b, myblog.t_type t,myblog.t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and (b.title like #{pattern} or b.content like #{pattern}) order by b.update_time desc

select b.id bid,b.first_picture,b.flag,b.title,b.content,b.ups,b.views,b.comment_count,b.update_time,b.commentabled,b.share_statement,b.appreciation, u.nickname,u.avatar,t.name, g.id tagId, g.name tagName from myblog.t_blog b,myblog.t_user u, myblog.t_type t,t_tag g, t_blog_tags tb where b.user_id = u.id and b.type_id = t.id and tb.blog_id = b.id and tb.tag_id = g.id and b.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update myblog.t_blog b set b.ups=b.ups+1 where id=#{id}
update myblog.t_blog b set b.day_views=b.day_views+1 where id=#{id}
